attributes.action: Allow the public to demand an immediate general election for Oct 15 2019
attributes.additional_details: I require that the general public have a say on who governs this country and who negotiates a deal with the EU. All polititians must except the result of this election to me completed on Oct 15th 2019 just like they must except the result of the referendum on 23 June 2016.
attributes.background: Sole trading Professional Architect in Gloucester England
